snippet: If he could land Peyton Manning, John Elway could get the best of worlds: a Hall of Fame quarterback in his image, and the ability to call shots without angering an army of second-guessers.
abstract: If he could land Peyton Manning, John Elway could get the best of worlds: a Hall of Fame quarterback in his image, and the ability to call shots without angering an army of second-guessers.
